sentences.en: "Forgive my manners," she said calmly. "I neglected to introduce myself."
sentences.cn: “请原谅我礼数不周，”她平静地说。“我忘了自我介绍了。”

sentences.en: A good example serves to promote good manners in the young.
sentences.cn: 好榜样可促使青年人讲礼貌.

sentences.en: Both boys had good manners, politely shaking hands.
sentences.cn: 这两个男孩都很有礼貌，友好地握了手。

sentences.en: He attacked the food as quickly as decent table manners allowed.
sentences.cn: 他在不失礼的情况下尽可能快地进餐。

sentences.en: He dressed well and had impeccable manners.
sentences.cn: 他衣冠楚楚，待人接物无可挑剔。

sentences.en: He was critical of the people, disparaging of their crude manners.
sentences.cn: 他对那些人很有看法，看不起他们粗俗的举止。

sentences.en: His behaviour offends against the canons of good manners.
sentences.cn: 他的行为违背了礼法的准则.

sentences.en: I wouldn't trust them in spite of all their la-di-da manners.
sentences.cn: 尽管他们处处显得很高雅的样子，我还是不相信他们。

sentences.en: Ladies and gentlemen paraded their fine manners, wit, and charm.
sentences.cn: 女士们和绅士们卖弄他们的美妙姿态 、 才智和魅力.

sentences.en: Many visitors complained of his bad manners and self-importance.
sentences.cn: 许多拜访者抱怨他高傲无礼。

sentences.en: Mother attaches a great deal of value to good manners.
The manners of many doctors were appalling.
This comedy of contemporary manners is told with compassion and acid humour.
sentences.cn: 这部当代风尚喜剧杂糅了悲悯的情怀和尖酸的幽默。

sentences.en: You should be ashamed of your bad manners.
sentences.cn: 你应该对自己的不礼貌感到羞耻。
